doc:
Ralph Marrero https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ralph_Marrero 0 Ralph Marrero (August 21, 1958 – November 16, 1991) was an American actor. He is best remembered for his potrayal of Pvt. Rickles in George A. Romero's 1985 zombie movie Day of the Dead. He also appeared in the film Tales from the Darkside: The Movie. Ralph_Marrero ( August_21_,_1958 – November_16_,_1991 ) was an_American_actor . He is_best_remembered for his_potrayal of Pvt._Rickles in George_A._Romero 's 1985_zombie movie_Day of the_Dead . He also appeared in the_film_Tales from the_Darkside : The_Movie .
